translations.module.aimbot.description: Automaticamente olha nas entidades selecionadas á volta de ti.
translations.module.autoArmor.description: Automaticamente equipa a melhor armadura no teu inventário.
translations.module.autoBow.description: Automaticamente dispara uma seta sempre que o teu árco estiver completamente carregado.
translations.module.autoClicker.description: Constantemente cliqua quando se preme num botão dum rato.
translations.module.autoLeave.description: Automaticamente faz te deixar um servidor quando a tua vida está baixa.
translations.module.autoRod.description: Automaticamente usa uma cana de pesca contra alvos.
translations.module.autoSoup.description: Automaticamente consome soupa sempre que a tua saúde estiver baixa.
translations.module.autoWeapon.description: Automaticamente escolhe a melhor arma no teu Automatically selects the best weapon in your hotbar.
translations.module.backtrack.description: Permite que tu ataques jogadores por clicar nas posições anteriores registades deles.
translations.module.bowAimbot.description: Automaticamente olha nas entidades selecionadas enquanto se usa um arco.
translations.module.fastBow.description: Torna o teu arco em uma metrelhadora.
translations.module.ignite.description: Automaticamente mete os teus alvos á volta de tí em fogo.
translations.module.killAura.description: Automaticamente ataca alvos á volta de tí.
translations.module.superKnockback.description: Increases knockback dealt to other entities.
translations.module.teleportHit.description: Permite que tu ataques jogadores de longe.
translations.module.tNTBlock.description: Automatically blocks with your sword when TNT around you explodes.
translations.module.trigger.description: Automaticamente ataca as entidates de que estás a olhar em.
translations.module.velocity.description: Permite que tu modifiques a quantidade de ""knockback"" que tu levas.
translations.module.antiHunger.description: Prevém que tu fiques com fome.
translations.module.bedGodMode.description: Permite que tu andes enquanto estás numa cama (Para 1.9)
translations.module.clip.description: Allows you to clip through blocks.
translations.module.airJump.description: Permite que tu saltes no meio do ár
translations.module.airLadder.description: Allows you to climb up ladders/vines without touching them.
translations.module.antiAFK.description: Prevents you from getting kicked for being AFK.
translations.module.antiBot.description: Prevém o KillAura de atacar bots dos AntiCheats.
translations.module.antiFireBall.description: Automaticamente ataqua ""fireballs"" para fora do teu redor.
translations.module.atAllProvider.description: Automaticamente menciona todos no servidor quando for utilizado '@a' na tua mensagem.
translations.module.autoAccount.description: Most feature-packed auto register/login & account manager.
translations.module.autoBreak.description: Automaticamente quebra o bloco que estás a olhar em.
translations.module.autoFish.description: Automatically catches fish when using a rod.
translations.module.autoTool.description: Automaticamente seleciona o melhor instrumento no teu inventário para destruir um bloco.
translations.module.blockESP.description: Permite que tu vejas um bloco selecionado através de paredes.
translations.module.blockOverlay.description: Permite que tu mudes o design do ""block overlay"".
translations.module.blockWalk.description: Permite que tu andes em não-fullblock blocos.
translations.module.breadcrumbs.description: Deixa uma trilha atrás de tí.
translations.module.bufferSpeed.description: Permite que tu andes mais rápido em lajes e escadas.
translations.module.bugUp.description: Automatically setbacks you after falling a certain distance.
translations.module.cameraClip.description: Permite que tu vejas atráves de paredes na vista de terceira pessoa.
translations.module.chams.description: Permite que tu vejas alvos através de blocos.
translations.module.chestAura.description: Automaticamente abre cofres á volta de tí.
translations.module.chestStealer.description: Automaticamente rouba todos os items de um cofre.
translations.module.civBreak.description: Permite que tu quebres blocos instantaneamente.
translations.module.componentOnHover.description: Allows you to see onclick action and value of chat message components when hovered.
translations.module.consoleSpammer.description: Spams the console of the server with errors.
translations.module.derp.description: Makes it look like you were derping around.
translations.module.eSP.description: Permite que tu vejas álvos através de paredes.
translations.module.fastBreak.description: Permite que tu quebres blocos mais rápido.
translations.module.fastClimb.description: Allows you to climb up ladders and vines faster.
translations.module.fastPlace.description: Allows you to place blocks faster.
translations.module.fastStairs.description: Allows you to climb up stairs faster.
translations.module.fastUse.description: Allows you to use items faster.
translations.module.fly.description: Allows you to fly in survival mode.
translations.module.forceUnicodeChat.description: Allows you to send unicode messages in chat.
translations.module.freeCam.description: Permite que tu mexas enquanto fora do teu corpo.
translations.module.freeze.description: Permite que tu estejas parado no meio do ár.
translations.module.fucker.description: Destrói blocos selecionados á volta de ti. (tambem conhecido como IDNuker)
translations.module.fullbright.description: Brightens up the world around you.
translations.module.ghost.description: Allows you to walk around and interact with your environment after dying.
translations.module.ghostHand.description: Allows you to interact with selected blocks through walls.
translations.module.highJump.description: Permite que tu saltes mais alto.
translations.module.iceSpeed.description: Permite que tu andes mais rápido em gelo.
translations.module.inventoryMove.description: Permite que tu andes enquanto estás num inventário.
translations.module.itemESP.description: Permite que tu vejas itens através de paredes.
translations.module.itemTeleport.description: Permie que tu adquires blocos longe.
translations.module.keepContainer.description: Allows you to open a formerly closed inventory container everywhere. (Press INSERT Key to open)
translations.module.kick.description: Allows you to kick yourself from a server.
translations.module.ladderJump.description: Boosts you up when touching a ladder. (AAC)
translations.module.liquidChat.description: Permite que tu fales com outros utilizadores do LiquidBounce.
translations.module.liquidWalk.description: Permite que tu andes em água.
translations.module.liquids.description: Permite que tu interajas com líquidos.
translations.module.midClick.description: Permite que tu adiciones um amigo por usar o botão direito nele.
translations.module.moreCarry.description: Allows you to store items in your crafting slots.
translations.module.multiActions.description: Permite que tu uses itens enquanto quebras bloosAllows you to use items while breaking blocks.
translations.module.nameProtect.description: Muda os nomes dos jogadores no clientside.
translations.module.nameTags.description: Changes the scale of the nametags so you can always read them.
translations.module.noBooks.description: Blocks server from opening books (forced ads, ...)
translations.module.noClip.description: Allows you to freely move through walls (A sandblock has to fall on your head).
translations.module.noFOV.description: Disables FOV changes caused by speed effect, etc.
translations.module.noFall.description: Prevents you from taking fall damage.
translations.module.noFluid.description: Ignore fluids like water and lava.
translations.module.noHurtCam.description: Disables hurt cam effect when getting hurt.
translations.module.noPitchLimit.description: Allows you to rotate your head indefinitely in every direction..
translations.module.noRotateSet.description: Prevents the server from rotating your head.
translations.module.noSlow.description: Cancels slowness effects caused by Soul Sand and using items.
translations.module.noSlowBreak.description: Automatically adjusts breaking speed when using modules that influence it.
translations.module.noSwing.description: Disabled swing effect when hitting an entity/mining a block.
translations.module.noWeb.description: Prevents you from getting slowed down in webs.
translations.module.parkour.description: Automatically jumps when reaching the edge of a block.
translations.module.perfectHorseJump.description: Automatically jumps when the jump bar of a horse is filled up completely.
translations.module.phase.description: Allows you to walk through blocks.
translations.module.pingSpoof.description: Spoofs your ping to a given value.
translations.module.plugins.description: Allows you to see which plugins the server is using.
translations.module.portalMenu.description: Allows you to open a menu while being in a portal.
translations.module.potionSaver.description: Freezes all potion effects while you are standing still.
translations.module.projectiles.description: Allows you to see where arrows will land.
translations.module.prophuntESP.description: Allows you to see disguised players in PropHunt.
translations.module.refill.description: Refills items such as blocks and food from inventory to hotbar.
translations.module.resourcePackSpoof.description: Prevents servers from forcing you to download their resource pack.
translations.module.reverseStep.description: Allows you to step down blocks faster.
translations.module.rotations.description: Allows you to see server-sided head and body rotations.
translations.module.safeWalk.description: Prevents you from falling down as if you were sneaking.
translations.module.scaffold.description: Automatically places blocks beneath your feet.
translations.module.serverCrasher.description: Allows you to crash certain server.
translations.module.skinDerp.description: Makes your skin blink (Requires multi-layer skin).
translations.module.slimeJump.description: Allows you to to jump higher on slime blocks.
translations.module.spammer.description: Spams the chat with a given message.
translations.module.speed.description: Permite que tu movas mais rápido.
translations.module.step.description: Permite que tu subas por blocos.
translations.module.storageESP.description: Permite que tu vejas cofres, etc. Através de paredes.
translations.module.strafe.description: Permite que tu movas no ar livremente.
translations.module.tNTESP.description: Allows you to see ignited TNT blocks through walls.
translations.module.teams.description: Evita o KillAura de atacar membros da equipa.
translations.module.timer.description: Muda a velocidade do jogo inteiro.
translations.module.tower.description: Automaticamente constrói uma torre em baixo de ti.
translations.module.tracers.description: Desenha uma linha para alvos á volta de ti.
translations.module.trueSight.description: Allows you to see invisible entities and barriers.
translations.module.vehicleOneHit.description: Permite que tu quebres veículus em um único ataque.
translations.module.wallClimb.description: Permite que tu subas paredes como uma aranha.
translations.module.waterSpeed.description: Permite que tu nades mais rápido.
translations.module.xRay.description: Permite que tu vejas minérios através de paredes.
translations.module.zoot.description: Remove todos os maus efeitos de poções/fogo.
